summary: This mod adds a small, but cozy house just on the outskirts of Dawn Star. This comforting house is perfect for a snowy retreat into Dawn Star.
descriptionHtml:
0.2v LIVE NOW!
--------------------------------------------------------------
This mod adds a small, but cozy house just on the outskirts of Dawn Star. This comforting house is perfect for a snowy retreat into Dawn Star. 
 
This is my very first mod that I made for Skyrim. 
-I will be updating this file quite a bit.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please help me out friends, and Donate. Very much Thankful!  More info in the link Below.
http://267mods.tumblr.com/
--------------------------------------------------------------
How To Enter The House:
There is a Book on the outside of the porch; read it, and it will tell you the location of the key.
--------------------------------------------------------------
LIVE 0.2v!
--------------------------------------------------------------
- Stable for your horse
- More rooms (Including Basement Surprise)
- Dragons now interact with the House
--------------------------------------------------------------
Up Coming With 0.3v
--------------------------------------------------------------
- (Sorry, Butler for bigger Project, see following info)
- (No Notes, later version 0.3v) 
- Maybe incorporating Dovahkiins Hideout (need permission from author)
- Full Crafting Basement
---------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION: Simply drop the .ESP File into your Skyrim Data folder
\"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\"
--------------------------------------------------------------
 
Thanks to my friend Bryce for testing this out.

If you would like me to add something, or there are any bugs at all, feel free to leave a comment, or email me at <> bill267mods@gmail.com <> And, Or <>Twitter:  @Bill267Mods  <>
author: Bill267
